message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"the number nine","sentence":"九个小朋友在学。","image_prompt":"A group of nine small children (HSK1: 小朋友) are sitting together, reading books in a classroom. Focus on clearly showing nine kids, each distinct, with simple background elements like desks and chairs. Use warm, soft apocalypse animation style: muted colors, gentle lighting, faint hints of overgrown plants or slightly aged decor blending with a calm and hopeful mood. The children look focused and happy while learning.","sentence_translation":"Nine children are studying."}
